scripts.sync-version: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const p = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./package.json')); const tauriPath = './src-tauri/tauri.conf.json'; const cargoPath = './src-tauri/Cargo.toml'; const tauri = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(tauriPath)); tauri.version = p.version; fs.writeFileSync(tauriPath, JSON.stringify(tauri, null, 2)); const cargo = fs.readFileSync(cargoPath, 'utf8'); const updatedCargo = cargo.replace(/version = \"[^\"]+\"/, `version = \"${p.version}\"`); fs.writeFileSync(cargoPath, updatedCargo); console.log('Versions synced to', p.version);"
